content: I think I'll keep the jewelry simple and understated, maybe a simple necklace with a small pendant or a pair of stud earrings. I don't want to over-accessorize and take away from the handbag and the burgundy accent. Speaking of which, I just remembered I have a 10% off coupon for Zara that I got when I bought the silk blouse. I might use it to get a burgundy belt to match the lip shade my sister loves!
